title: Honestly, Neeko Feels Like a LeBlanc VGU
body:
It pains me to see a concept that should have been on another champion, but it gets put on a new champion. Players said the idea of using illusions to hide your champion would be great on LeBlanc. Here it is on a new champion and not on the master illusionist who tricks people. I think it's fair to say that these Developers just don't care about their older champion pool anymore. They do half-arsed work on reworks for older champions, unless the champion is a popular one. They are constantly prioritizing reworks and VGU on popular and new champions. It feels like all they ever talk about is the same crap over and over again.

The new champion looks fun and great. Unfortunately it feels like a concept that we already had in the game on an older champion. Yet again, concepts and abilities are being stolen from one champion and put on a new one.

replies.body:
Neeko's mimic is her passive and only works on allied champions. It won't be as RNG as Zyra's plants, but it's not something she will be able to cast at will and will need a bit more "thought" to properly setup.

They could still give LeBlanc something similar in allowing her to mimic enemy champions. Now that would be devious.
